name: Bingo BOOM - Explosive Game
description:
This is not a regular bingo game. It's not a relaxing game for your grandma.
You are probably don't even have a fast enough reaction time to play this game.
If you think you do, play it now.

Tap the numbers before the bomb explodes. There are hundreds of levels with different types of cards. How far can you go?
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
